field.name: organizationPartyId
field.description: The internal organization Party that is liable for the account.

field.name: actualBalance
field.description: Calculated as the sum of FinancialAccountTrans.amount

field.name: availableBalance
field.description: Calculated as actualBalance minus sum of outstanding FinancialAccountAuth.amount

field.name: orderItemSeqId
field.description: To be used along with orderId to point to an OrderItem that represents the purchase of a product to add money to the account.

field.name: referenceNumber
field.description: Vendor or other invoice number.

field.name: overrideOrgPartyId
field.description: Used to specify the organization override rather than using the fromPartyId and/or toPartyId (depending on which is an internal org).

field.name: overrideGlAccountId
field.description: The override or actual glAccountId used for the AcctgTransEntry based on the InvoiceItem. If empty the glAccountId will be determined based on configuration or custom code.

field.name: paymentFraudEvidenceId
field.description: Refer to evidence here if trustLevelEnumId is gray listed or black listed.

field.name: cardNumberLookupHash
field.description: A one-way hash (SHA, etc) of the cardNumber used for looking up a credit card by its number in a secure way.

field.name: validFromDate
field.description: Not common in some parts of the world.

field.name: expireDate
field.description: String representing the date in the format: MM/yyyy

field.name: issueNumber
field.description: Single digit number on some Switch and Maestro cards.

field.name: paymentGatewayTypeEnumId
field.description: Each payment gateway integration should define a PaymentGatewayType Enumeration record plus an entity with a shared PK (ie PK is paymentGatewayConfigId).

field.name: authorizeServiceName
field.description: Service implementing mantle.account.PaymentServices.authorize#Payment interface.

field.name: captureServiceName
field.description: Service implementing mantle.account.PaymentServices.capture#Payment interface.

field.name: releaseServiceName
field.description: Service implementing mantle.account.PaymentServices.release#Payment interface.

field.name: refundServiceName
field.description: Service implementing mantle.account.PaymentServices.refund#Payment interface.

field.name: paymentGatewayConfigId
field.description: Use this PaymentGatewayConfig for auth/etc. For Payments by CC/etc that are not from an order and/or the order is not associated with a ProductStore. Also set automatically on auth for capture, etc.

field.name: orderId
field.description: Set if the Payment represents the payment settings for an Order.

field.name: orderPartSeqId
field.description: Set if the Payment represents the payment settings for an OrderPart.

field.name: overrideGlAccountId
field.description: Overrides the GlAccount for the PaymentMethod entry, ie for the cash account the payment goes into.

field.name: overrideOrgPartyId
field.description: Used to specify the organization override rather than using the fromPartyId and/or toPartyId (depending on which is an internal org).

entity.description:
Evidence of payment fraud with references to the Payment and possibly OrderHeader that represents the fraud.
Other entities like ContactMech and PaymentMethod have a reference to this entity when they are gray- or black-listed based on this evidence.

field.name: overrideGlAccountId
field.description: If filled in, payment is applied directly against this GL account

field.name: toPaymentId
field.description: To be used when a payment is based on or comes from another payment, like a payment that is a return of a mistaken or over-payment
